13:25 <vmassol> sdumitriu: FYI I put the exact hsqldb version because that allows me to copy paste the full line. I use this frequently and it's a helper for me :)

15:10 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Did you try copy/pasting the command with the \* ?  
15:11 <sdumitriu> \* is a standard character supported even by DOS  
15:11 <vmassol> ah indeed if it works it's great  
15:11 <vmassol> I'll try it now  
15:12 <sdumitriu> That's one command that can be copy/pasted even by XWiki 1.0 users, without having to find the right version of the hsqldb jar  
15:12 <vmassol> yes you're right, it works and it' s great :)  
15:12 <vmassol> thank you  
15:12 <vmassol> fixing page  
15:12 <vmassol> done  
15:13 <vmassol> thanks again sdumitriu
